images.description: A minimalist line-art logo depicting a house outline in green. The design is simple and clean. Context: Used as a primary logo for the website. Its simplicity offers good scalability and recognition. Represents the core business of construction and building.

A newly renovated dark and white chalet-style house with a steep roof, surrounded by green grass and trees under a partly cloudy sky. Context: Featured as a completed project example on the homepage ('OMLAZENÍ CHALUPY U TANVALDU'). Good lighting and composition, showcasing the final result of a facade reconstruction and insulation project.

A renovated family house with a new dark gray tiled roof and light-colored facade, seen from the street with cars parked in front. The sky is partly cloudy. Context: Featured as a completed project example on the homepage ('KOMPLETNÍ REKONTRUKCE RODINNÉHO DOMU'). Shows a significant renovation, high quality image.

A renovated chalet-style house with a dark roof and white exterior, located in a green, wooded area. A person stands near the entrance on the right. Context: Found in the 'References' section, showcasing a completed facade and roof renovation project. High resolution and good overall visual quality.

A side view of the renovated chalet-style house, featuring its new roof and white facade, surrounded by lush green foliage under a clear sky. A ladder is propped against the side of the house. Context: Found in the 'References' section, providing an alternative angle of a completed project. Good quality and shows attention to detail.

The front view of a newly renovated chalet-style house with a dark roof, white facade, and dark brown window frames, set against a backdrop of dense forest. Context: Found in the 'References' section, highlights the completed exterior work. Good quality and clearly displays the outcome.

A freshly renovated bathroom with white walls, green tiles, a white toilet, and new light fixture. A round mirror leans against the wall. Context: 'After' image from the 'References' section, showing the result of an interior renovation. Good quality and clearly demonstrates the finished work.

A renovated hallway space featuring newly plastered white walls, a wooden coat rack, a large window, and tiled flooring. Context: 'After' image from the 'References' section, providing a view of the completed interior work. Good lighting and detailed.

A close-up view of a newly renovated house exterior featuring clean white walls and dark window frames. Shows multiple angles of the building's facade. Context: 'After' image from the 'References' section, highlighting the meticulous finishing of a renovation project in Prague. High quality and good representative of craftsmanship.

A modern, light-colored, two-story house with dark roof tiles, partially under construction, showing initial facade work. Some scaffolding and construction materials are visible at the bottom. Context: 'In-progress' image from the 'References' section, illustrating a new build or substantial exterior renovation in Jevany. Good perspective and light, with potential to be part of a 'before/after' set if a matching 'after' is available.

A side view of a contemporary white house with dark window frames and a contrasting dark roof, located in a semi-rural setting. Construction materials are visible in the foreground. Context: 'In-progress' or near-completion image from the 'References' section, depicting a new construction or major rebuild. Good clear image of the facade.

The rear view of a modern two-story white house with several windows and a dark roof, showing the facade finish. Construction debris is visible around the base of the house. Context: Another 'in-progress' or near-completion image from the 'References' section, showing the back of the newly built or renovated property. Consistent quality with other Jevany images.

The newly renovated orange facade of a multi-story office building with many white windows and ornate architectural details. Several cars are parked on the street in front. Context: 'After' image from the 'References' section, showcasing a completed facade renovation of a commercial building. Provides excellent context of finished work in an urban setting. Good resolution.

An excavator positioned next to a newly dug pit, cordoned off with red and white striped tape, in a green field with other machinery in the background. Context: An 'in-progress' image from the 'References' section, illustrating land networking (zasíťování pozemků) or ground work services. Provides a clear visual of the work environment and equipment.

A construction worker in a safety vest and hard hat crouching beside a large concrete manhole being installed in a trench. Context: An 'in-progress' image from the 'References' section, illustrating a specific aspect of land networking or utility installation. Good clear view of the work.

Two construction workers in safety vests are working in a dug trench, appearing to lay down material for utility lines. The trench is surrounded by loose soil. Context: An 'in-progress' image from the 'References' section, showing the labor aspect of ground work or utility installation. Good raw depiction of work.

A long, deep trench with large orange pipes laid along its length, and construction workers engaged in activity further down. An excavator is also visible in the background. Context: An 'in-progress' image from the 'References' section, clearly depicting pipeline installation work. Provides a comprehensive view of the trenching and piping process.
